name: Smash Santa !
description:
Free AR game for Xmas !

Remember all the expensive gifts that you were hoping to find under that Xmas tree in your living room ? They never showed up, right ? How come ? Don't you think someone must pay for that loss ? Don't you think that this dude with a ridiculous red housecoat desserves a little revenge ? HE WAS IN CHARGE, wasn't he ?

The great news is that WE HAVE KIDNAPPED SANTA CLAUS and NOW YOU CAN SMASH HIM WITH SNOWBALLS ! Time for revenge !

★ Here is what you have to do ★

1. Download the app

2. Go to our website www.james-bang.com on your computer and launch the app on your mobile

3. Overlay JamesBang logos and...

...Smash Santa !
